title: Did Kamala Harris say that protests "will not get away, nor should they? '
subtitle: The comments of the Democratic Vice-President ' s candidate led to allegations that she was encouraging riots.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In an interview in June 2020, the Democratic Vice-President of the United States, Kamala Harris, said about the brutal protests against the police at the national level: beware of all. They will not stop until election day in November, they will not stop after election day, they will not give up, and they should not."
